info.title: disease.sh Docs - An open API for disease-related statistics
info.description: Third Party API for reliable global disease information

tags.name: COVID-19: Worldometers
tags.description: (COVID-19 data sourced from Worldometers, updated every 10 minutes)

tags.name: COVID-19: JHUCSSE
tags.description: (COVID-19 data sourced from Johns Hopkins University, updated every 10 minutes)

tags.name: COVID-19: NYT
tags.description: (COVID-19 data sourced from the New York Times, updated every 24 hours)

tags.name: COVID-19: Apple
tags.description: (COVID-19 related mobility trend data from Apple, updated every 24 hours)

tags.name: COVID-19: Government
tags.description: (COVID-19 individual government reported data, updated every 24 hours)

tags.name: COVID-19: Vaccine
tags.description: (COVID-19 vaccine trial data from raps.org, updated every 24 hours)

tags.name: COVID-19: Therapeutics
tags.description: (COVID-19 therapeutic trial data from raps.org, updated every 24 hours)

tags.name: Influenza: CDC
tags.description: (Influenza data reported by the United States CDC, updated every 24 hours)

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: twoDaysAgo
parameters.description: Queries data reported two days ago

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get global COVID-19 totals for today, yesterday and two days ago

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Provided a key (e.g. cases, todayCases, deaths, active), result will be sorted from greatest to least

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for all US States

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: State name or comma separated names spelled correctly

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for specific US State(s)

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: twoDaysAgo
parameters.description: Queries data reported two days ago

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Provided a key (e.g. cases, todayCases, deaths, recovered, active), results will be sorted from greatest to least

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for all continents

parameters.name: continent
parameters.description: Continent name

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: twoDaysAgo
parameters.description: Queries data reported two days ago

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Setting to false gives you the ability to fuzzy search continents (i.e. Oman vs. rOMANia)

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for a specific continent

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: twoDaysAgo
parameters.description: Queries data reported two days ago

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Provided a key (e.g. cases, todayCases, deaths, recovered, active), the result will be sorted from greatest to least

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for all countries

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A country name, iso2, iso3, or country ID code

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: twoDaysAgo
parameters.description: Queries data reported two days ago

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Setting to false gives you the ability to fuzzy search countries (i.e. Oman vs. rOMANia)

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for a specific country

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Multiple country names, iso2, iso3, or country IDs separated by commas

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: Queries data reported a day ago

parameters.name: twoDaysAgo
parameters.description: Queries data reported two days ago

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for a specific set of countries
Get COVID-19 totals for all countries and their provinces
Get COVID-19 totals for all US counties

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: Name of any county in the USA. All counties are listed in the /v3/covid-19/jhucsse/counties/ endpoint

get.summary: Get COVID-19 totals for a specific county

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for all countries and their provinces

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get global accumulated COVID-19 time series data

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A country name, iso2, iso3, or country ID code

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for a specific country

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Multiple country names, iso2, iso3, or country IDs separated by commas

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for a specific set of countries

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A country name, iso2, iso3, or country ID code

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Province name. All available names can be found in the /v3/covid-19/historical/{query} endpoint

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for a specific province in a country

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A country name, iso2, iso3, or country ID code

parameters.name: provinces
parameters.description: Provinces spelled correctly separated by ',' or '|' delimiters, never both in the same query

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for a set of provinces in a country
Get all possible US States to query the /historical/usacounties/{state} endpoint with
get.description: Returns a list of US States and provinces

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: US state name, validated in the array returned from the /v3/covid-19/historical/usacounties endpoint

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for all counties in a specified US state

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for all states, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State name(s), separated by commas (e.g. 'Illinois, California')

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for a state or set of states, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for all available US counties, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: County name(s), separated by commas (e.g. 'Alameda, Humboldt')

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Use 'all' for the full data set (e.g. 15, all, 24)

get.summary: Get COVID-19 time series data for a county or set of counties, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began
Get COVID-19 time series data for the entire USA, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began
Get a list of supported countries for Apple mobility data
get.description: Returns a list of supported country names

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A valid country name from the /v3/covid-19/apple/countries endpoint

get.summary: Get a list of supported subregions for specific country in the Apple mobility data set
get.description: Returns a list of supported subregions in a country where data is available

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A valid country name from the /v3/covid-19/apple/countries endpoint

parameters.name: subregions
parameters.description: Valid subregion(s) from the /v3/covid-19/apple/countries/{country} endpoint, separated by with commas

get.summary: Get COVID-19 Apple mobility data for subregions of a country
get.description: Returns a list of mobility data entries for subregion(s) every day since January 13th. Each entry has driving, transit, and walking data with an associated number of percentage change since January 13th

get.summary: Get a list of supported countries for government specific data
get.description: Returns a list of supported country names

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A valid country name from the /v3/covid-19/gov endpoint

parameters.name: allowNull
parameters.description: By default, if a value is missing, it is returned as 0. This allows nulls to be returned

get.summary: Get COVID-19 government reported data for a specific country

Get vaccine trial data from RAPS (Regulatory Affairs Professional Society). Specifically published by Jeff Craven at https://www.raps.org/news-and-articles/news-articles/2020/3/covid-19-vaccine-tracker

Get therapeutics trial data from RAPS (Regulatory Affairs Professional Society). Specifically published by Jeff Craven at https://www.raps.org/news-and-articles/news-articles/2020/3/covid-19-therapeutics-tracker
Get Influenza-like-illness data for the 2019 and 2020 outbreaks from the US Center for Disease Control
Get Influenza report data for the 2019 and 2020 outbreaks from the US Center for Disease Control, reported by US clinical labs
Get Influenza report data for the 2019 and 2020 outbreaks from the US Center for Disease Control, reported by US public health labs

timeline.description: The amount of key-value pairs in 'cases', 'deaths' and 'recovered' is dependent on the 'lastdays' query

covidHistoricalAll.description: The amount of key-value pairs in 'cases', 'deaths' and 'recovered' is dependent on the 'lastdays' query

timeline.description: The amount of key-value pairs in 'cases', 'deaths' and 'recovered' is dependent on the 'lastdays' query
The amount of key-value pairs in 'cases', 'deaths' and 'recovered' is dependent on the 'lastdays' query
The amount of key-value pairs in 'cases', 'deaths' and 'recovered' is dependent on the 'lastdays' query
